description: Variation of condition 2 of planning permission ref: 2024/02199/FUL granted 29th October 2024 for the 'Erection of a rear roof extension, erection of a dormer window and a rooflight in the front roofslope and raising the ridge height of the main roof; installation of 2no French doors and a window to replace the existing doors and windows at ground floor level to the rear elevation; alterations to the roof of ground floor back addition to include the installation of new rooflights; installation of 2no windows to the side of the main building at ground floor level' to allow amendments to the approved drawings to include: alterations to the design of the windows within the dormer to the front roofslope, re-location of 1no rooflight to the front roofslope, installation of 1no rooflight above the flat roof of rear roof extension, alterations to the design of the windows within the rear roof extension, reposition and installation of addition rooflights to the roof of the ground floor back addition; re-location of windows to the side flank elevation.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
